Uses of Class
eu.iv4xr.framework.extensions.ltl.Buchi

Packages that use Buchi
Package
Description
eu.iv4xr.framework.extensions.ltl
This package provides the following features: The classes LTL and BoundedLTL implementing Linear Temporal Logic formulas, and the bounded variation of them.

  • Uses of Buchi in eu.iv4xr.framework.extensions.ltl

    BuchiModelChecker.findShortest​(Buchi buchi, int maxDepth)
    Similar to BuchiModelChecker.find(Buchi, int), but it will return the shortest execution (of the specified max-length) that satisfies the Buchi.

    SATVerdict
    BuchiModelChecker.sat​(Buchi buchi, int maxDepth)
